title: 51: Lizard Kings in the Metaverse
dc:creator: Canon Press
description:
• Did you know you can tip the guys? They do this (mostly) for fun—Venmo a few bucks to storiesasf to tip them a cuppa. Who knows, Nate might even allow Caleb to bring back faux Narnia as a reward.
  • Today's SASF begins with a Scottish story and associated Scottish music recc—Gerry Cinnamon's "Belter." (No, we don't know what the lyrics say either.)
  • The guys move on to Facebook Meta and the Lizard King himself, Mark Zuckerberg.
  • They finish up with a bunch of questions about video games as a storytelling medium. In short.... another forty minutes of consuming stories with N.D. Wilson and Brian Kohl.

#StoriesAreSoulFood #SASF

Check out our full selection of children's fiction: https://canonballbooks.com/
